properties.Observatio: Stone terraces have been built along the left bank of stream, About 110.0m long section of stone terraces is dilapidated.
properties.Descriptio: Construction of 1:3:6 (1 1/2") ct concrete retaining wall (height 1.5m, top width 0.15m, 0.50m high steps x 03, each of 0.15m step width & bottom width 0.60m)Vegetative cover improving (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Areca nut seedlings @ 1.5m spacing in two rows,

properties.Observatio: The Padiyapelella city's garbage is dumped daily on the banks of the Belihul Oya. Toilets have been constructed in Padiyapelella town but have not been opened, resulting in a large number of people who come to the town daily using the banks of Belihul Oy
